thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 16 of 61
thread.title: Rebecca K

author: Rebecca K
title: Rebecca K
text:
My experience with Ssense over the years has always been one of detached yet covetous hours of browsing, adding to cart, and never following through. Why? Because I am in Australia and the international postage fee of $50usd was just insane - but now the threshold for free shipping has been lowered and the standard international shipping fee a more reasonable price I was happy to place my first order :D
I enjoy the minimal design of the site, the photography beautiful, styling cool and love the huge images. Checkout was easy and I was so happy to find you had stock in the size I needed where most other stores had sold out.
The next time I'm in the market for a luxury purchase Ssense will be my first stop!
